title: anyone else having this problem
body: okay so i came home and i was like what to do so i wanted to play some lol. started up the client then i saw a update was taking place so i was like meh 10 mins or so. its been 2 hours now and its at 33% (it was there as soon as the update started) and its only scanned 5 files help me plz getting help from a rioter would be nice but i need some help im meant to be teaching my mate how to play so plz if anyone knows how to fix this problem plz help me and fast ty

replies.body:
no 
error messages i been at 5 files for a WHOLE DAY NOW i left my laptop on all night still nothing 5 files scanned
Were there any error messages that came up at any point, either from when you got back or while you were waiting?

i was having a similar problem it was stuck on 33% however for mine it just scanned literally thousands of files so  in the end i went to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_game_client\filearchive (a computer file) and deleted the filearchive then itll reinstall but u gotta wait a few hours for it to do so
